website_summaries.verdict: A well-made press by a brand cooks trust – with the exception of those with very small hands or limited strength, it's a solid choice.
pros: An updated model that features sturdy handles and a useful cleaning brush that conveniently stores in the unit when closed
cons: Users with small hands find it somewhat difficult to squeeze, but it still garners a lot of praise from happy customers

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of pressure to crush a clove of garlic. Large cloves will not fit well in it. It doesn't clean easily. Maybe if you put it in the dishwasher it would be fine. It actually takes so much pressure to squeeze it, I am worried it will break soon. Sometimes I brace it on the counter and put my weight into it. The cleaning tool shown here was not included. I use a toothbrush, soap and hot water. Still there is garlic stuck in it. Certainly not worth the price they charge.
customer_reviews.author: kijjik

customer_reviews.title: I love that the cleaning tool is easily stored on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This garlic press is well constructed, durable and holds up well. Both my daughter and I have this one. I love that the cleaning tool is easily stored on the inside handle. It works well, and cleans up nicely. I ordered a second one for my daughter because her dog chewed up the cleaning tool which fell on the floor, unbeknown to her at the time! We have both had this press for over two years, and it is still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: We went paleo and I can’t tell you how many times I use my garlic press. I purchased this one as a second since my press is always in the dishwasher. It cleans soooo easily. It is the only one I use now. Just rinse it, use the cleaner thing it comes with and viola! It’s completely clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Helt

customer_reviews.title: Best Garlic Press!
customer_reviews.text: I do love Pampered Chef products despite some of their things being absolutely overpriced. That's not the case with this product - I'm convinced this is THE best garlic press ever. My mom used my garlic press once and fell in love with it too. My pampered chef consultant quit so I was happy to find this on amazon. I did not have the issue that other reviewers had with it missing the cleaner piece - my mom said that it arrived in new packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: BEST GARLIC PRESS EVER
customer_reviews.text: Over 30 years ago I purchased one of these at a PAMPERED CHEF party. Now that the parties are not given so often and I lost my original in my move. I resorted to going to AMAZON to find it...Yayyyy they had it.
customer_reviews.author: LYNDA MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Best garlic press ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! I had one for many years (10+) and my husband was helping with a large clove and broke it... I was devasted, used a Tupperware one, bought a cheaper replacement... awful... Bough another Pampered Chef one, about 2 months ago and WILL NEVER OWN A DIFFERENT KING. We cook Blue Apron dinners 3 times a week (have for 2 years) and this is so easy to use for all the garlic I go through.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to supplement my 40+ year old Swiss made Susi (which is perfect for small cloves of garlic). This one has handles that are very ergonomic, and handles large cloves like elephant garlic (or multiple small ones) as well as ginger. It is very easy to clean, especially if you DON'T peel the garlic- all the debris comes out when you remove the peel. I usually don't bother to use the cleaning tool, just remove the peel and rinse. I just hope it lasts as long as my Susi.
customer_reviews.author: Ososanna

customer_reviews.title: Reliable standby
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this to replace a previous Pampered Chef model that served well for >20 years of almost daily use. We recently got a dishwasher (a first!) and after running this guy through, the surface was eroding, leaving black particles on pressed garlic, and rubbing off on hands. No matter! It has served very well, and I was happy to find a replacement, which on first uses, works just as well. This is one of those gadgets that is life changing, or at least dinner changing! A well deserved retirement for my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Improved design
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Pampered Chef Garlic press. I loved the first one, recommended it to friends and then bought another one so I could have the first one in my travel bag. The design has been improved in that the bowl is bigger and accommodates a larger clove of garlic. The best thing about this press (and the older version) is that the garlic does not have to be peeled before using.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: The best garlic mincer!
customer_reviews.text: If not attending a Pampered Chef party, this is the best garlic press I have ever used. Mine was bought at a party 10 years ago. This one was bought for my sister. She had bought a cheaper one. I told her to return it. Speaking from experience of buying cheaper, this is will be the first and last one you will ever need to buy!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: All around perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this garlic press! I got it after using my sisters. It takes all the difficulty out of chopping garlic. And the small tool for cleaning makes it so easy. It has a little scraper on the end if the handle. It’s so well made I’m gushing I will never need another.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Best garlic press around
customer_reviews.text: Worth the investment. I bought one at a Pampered Chef party about 15 years ago, and used it almost every day. It finally broke, and I just had to replace it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: karrie ishmael

customer_reviews.title: Good press
customer_reviews.text: Does seem to get more garlic out of each clove. Do peel garlic first if you want to get the most out of each clove. Does require more hand strength to use than Oxo brand, although Pampered Chef seems to get more garlic from each clove. Cloves need to be turned a certain way to fit, but this is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: curlygirl88

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I bought one to replace the one I bought 25 years ago. Not because the first one wore out or broke. But because we think it got tossed out by mistake. Don’t ask how!! My husband felt bad and got me a garlic press from a store and it stunk!! Absolutely NO comparison to the Pampered Chef. I mean none!! You will not in any way be sorry if you buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: This is THE garlic press. Don't waste your time on others.
customer_reviews.text: I will probably never try another garlic press again. Had one of these that lasted fifteen years, replaced it with something that didn't last a week, and finally got this new Pampered Chef garlic press. I'm a happy camper. Let's see if this one lasts fifteen years like the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole B

customer_reviews.title: Best garlic press
customer_reviews.text: Probably the nicest garlic press I’ve owned. The little comb it comes with is wonderful for cleaning. We have had this for a while now and it’s holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my mom had one and I love it! Very easy to use and you don’t have to put as much pressure on it than most other ones I have used. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected from pampered chef. High end garlic press. Love a press where I do not have to peel the cloves. Also love the brush that cleans out the remnants before placing it in the dish washer
customer_reviews.author: Miriam klier

customer_reviews.title: The only garlic press to buy
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these growing up. I tried a few cheaper brands and they all broke fairly easily (cheap plastic in a press device, go figure) and didn't come with easy cleaning tool. PC really perfected this device and the cleaning tool is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of fress garlic but hate mincing it! I've bought a garlic press before that didn't work well at all but this crushes the garlic (or ginger) so easily and efficiently and cleans like a breeze! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: both received and given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: It's the best garlic press. You can press cloves even without getting all the layers of skin stuff off first, it just mashes them very well, and then comes with a tool to clean itself after.
customer_reviews.author: corig123

customer_reviews.title: Great Garlic Press
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't lost the cleaning device but aside from that, this is the best garlic press I've ever used. I use garlic in nearly every recipe I make and heavily rely on this product. It has taken a beating but still works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic garlic press
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sturdy garlic press that was easy to clean and I got it. It was fast, efficient and easy to clean. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Snickerfritz

customer_reviews.title: Sends all the garlic through the holes so I don’t have to keep using another clove
customer_reviews.text: Pressing garlic...while living in California I had purchased numerous garlic presses of all kinds , they always had so much garlic flesh coming up the side with minimal garlic coming out through the holes...I had one of these at my house in Texas, which I love, do when I seen it for sale here I purchased 3, one for each of my daughters’ homes, and the added “hole cleaner” is great...this beats all other brands, even the pricey ones I’ve tried...Great Product !
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My hand does hurt when I use it a lot (I'm talking crushing 4 heads of garlic), but it does give you the perfect minced result.
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Black garlic
customer_reviews.text: Loved this garlic press until it started turning the garlic black. If you pay that type of money for a garlic press it should last a much longer time, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: damrpapa11

customer_reviews.title: No need to peel your garlic!!
customer_reviews.text: No more peeling skins and sticky fingers! I just cut the ends off and squeeze the bulbs in the press. Works great and all skin pushes to the back/side. Easy to clean the holes with the attachment. I have only hand washed the press. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Great garlic press
customer_reviews.text: I love my pampered chef garlic press so I bought another for my son. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lavy

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: This press can be used without having to peel the garlic bulbs. Then you can lift the peel out after use. This also makes it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great garlic press
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite garlic press. You don't have to peel the garlic cloves beforehand. It works well!
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Hole cleaner attaches to the handle
customer_reviews.text: Had the old version of this garlic press for 10 years before it finally broke. Replaced it with a new one, and it works just as well as the old one. Best garlic press I've ever had. Love how the hole cleaner attaches to the handle, so it doesn't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: ADN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to clean and use. Works beautifully. We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Valente

customer_reviews.title: Excellent long wear product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It was a replacement for my 20 year old pampered chef garlic press. Only one I will use!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This product imPressed me!
customer_reviews.text: Great garlic press! It is easy to use and simple to clean. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lise Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing press
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I read a review on a food box site and the customer recommended this press and they were right! It’s amazing and you get the most of your garlic bulb.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Simply put it’s the best
customer_reviews.text: No more peeling garlic. Put the whole clove inside and press. Done. If you need one look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Pamper chef is my wife's favorite product
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought the original version 25 years ago and it just got worn out and broke so I replaced it with this new version and she's very happy with the product. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy p Marable

customer_reviews.title: My favorite press
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the easiest presses to use, the only downfall this product has is that it takes a little bit more to clean it up. Even considering cleaning difficulties I like this press way more than any other press I have ever used because it is so easy to use when I’m cooking!!!
customer_reviews.author: McSweeney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and love it, i bought 2 because one will be for my sister....
customer_reviews.author: Johanne laBarre

customer_reviews.title: Best garlic press out there
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best garlic press I have ever owned. I had another one for years that I was looking to replace. At first I tried other brands that were less expensive but in the end nothing compares. I can press the garlic with the skin on and it doesn’t push garlic out of the sides like the others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Senese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Garlic Press
customer_reviews.text: The best garlic press I've ever had! Get your finger in there, & the cleaning is easy! Garlic press is heavy, which only improves it's quality. This is my 2nd one (misplaced the first) & the first never rusted even after having over 2 years! Often times, I don't get the outer shell completely off before putting in garlic press & it does the work for me! I'd highly recommend it as a gift or a keeper:)
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Quality garlic press!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I love garlic so this is very nice as it makes adding garlic quick, easy and the press is very simple to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for many years and bought this one for my granddaughter who just started cooking; she loved using mine so now she has her own & is very satisfied with this garlic press.
customer_reviews.author: Barb C

customer_reviews.title: This is the best garlic press.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garlic press. I just bought my second one after almost 25 years. Haven't found any other press that works as well
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Long

customer_reviews.title: Best Garlic press
customer_reviews.text: Perfect leverage, had one for over 15 years and got this one for my sister in law. She also raves about it.
customer_reviews.author: Aiping

customer_reviews.title: Nifty garlic press
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability and ease of use. The small plastic brush helps with clean-up. Truly love this garlic press!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garlic press I've ever used. Easy to clean with the attached brush and works perfectly with every use!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This garlic press works very well! It is a sturdy kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best on the market! Will last your lifetime. Well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Garlic press by Pampered Chef
customer_reviews.text: Just at advertised. Pampered Chef without having to go to a party.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is the best garlic press on the market. Easy too use, easy to clean. There is no wobble or jiggle of the parts. Smooth action back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Garlic press from Pampered Chef
customer_reviews.text: I have had three other brand garlic presses prior to this one and the others just didn't get the job done and were hard to clean. The Pampered Chef press is perfect, I have small hands so the grip is just right for me and it is the easiest press I have ever had to clean.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Best garlic press I've ever used. Had it for ages now and it doesn't have rust. I live that I don't have to peel the garlic clove before mincing!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mack

customer_reviews.title: I love this product so much I bought one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much I bought one for my sister. Great long term, I have had mine for about 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal A. Lupo

customer_reviews.title: I got this to replace one I bought about 20yrs ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace one I bought about 20yrs ago. I find this one harder to press out the garlic.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great piece of equipment! Heavy duty & easy to clean. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: The best Garlic press
customer_reviews.text: The best Garlic press. Bought as a stocking stuffer to replace one we have had for about 12 years. All the others I have found that look the same have difficulty closing over the clove and I end up spending a lot of time aligning the metal pieces.
customer_reviews.author: UsuallySmlng

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use fresh garlic all of the time and this press is the very best. I have tried many others (some way more expensive) and they do not work.... this is an exceptional garlic press and you don't even have to peel the cloves of garlic. I do not have very strong hands and I can still use this press.... as others are virtually impossible for me to squeeze! One of my favorite Pampered Chef products! :)
customer_reviews.author: Becky D.

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this garlic press
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this garlic press, it works very well. I especially like the cleaning tool and appreciate the unique holder for this tool so that is doesn't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite kitchen tools. I should've bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of garlic that comes out when you mince. With my old press I would need to use double the amount of cloves because of how much garlic was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: jessalyn l.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone has to have it in the kitchen. It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it every single day. It’s easy to clean and easy to use. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rossi S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for any cook
customer_reviews.text: We have used this press for about a month so we cannot speak to long term durability. It seems to be very well built, cleans easily with the included brush and does a great job smashing/separating garlic from the paper shell.
customer_reviews.author: L West

customer_reviews.title: About as good as I could find.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use for people with small hands. Not the quality of previous version but as good as seems to be available.
customer_reviews.author: Babs J

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the size of the garlic produced.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This garlic press is awesome. The multi-use cleaning tool is so handy, and it stores right on the press!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Best press available
customer_reviews.text: Best garlic press available. I had one for a decade, then the pin fell out. I tried three other brands of presses from local stores before I just ordered another one of the Pampered Chef version. The construction of the other ones I tried did not even come close to the quality of this one. This press is so much easier to use then others. It is all one piece so you don't have to deal with the little tray insert coming out like on other brands. Love the cleaning tool as well. COMPLETELY worth spending the extra money for the quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Angie L.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing and very well designed
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a different garlic press. This thing is amazing and very well designed!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL RENZO OLLIE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and works well. Having the cleaner is a nice extra.

customer_reviews.title: but so good at its job it was worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A uni-tasker, but so good at its job it was worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Worth the price bc cheaper products do not get the same outcome

customer_reviews.text: Easily presses garlic in the skin, also good for key limes and ginger.

customer_reviews.text: this is the best garlic press ever. you don't have to peel the garlic! you just put the unpeeled clove into the garlic press, press & VOILA! perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Actually I purchased this for our sons birthday. Being a newly wed he likes to help in the kitchen. I have one of these and like it.

customer_reviews.title: Best Garlic Press Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this press from a Pampered Chef party after a previous one I had broke. I use it multiple times a week (we love garlic) and it works wonderfully! Also the hands are all one piece so no problem with it breaking or snapping like my cheaper other one did!

product_meta.title: Pampered Chef Garlic Press 2575 - Easy Squeeze, Rust Proof, Ergonomic Handle - Professional Garlic Mincer & Ginger Press with Handy Cleaning Brush
product_meta.description: Size:6 inches longPampered Chef Garlic Press 2575 - Easy Squeeze, Rust Proof, Ergonomic Handle - Professional Garlic Mincer & Ginger Press with Handy Cleaning Brush
feature_bullets: Aluminum with nonstick, silicone based coating.
Extra large hopper accommodates large garlic cloves, ginger, and horseradish.
Cleaning tool stores in the handle so it wont get lost.
